text: Iryanthera megistocarpa is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is endemic to Panama. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== * Mitré, M. 1998. Iryanthera megistocarpa. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. title: Iryanthera megistocarpa
